Title: Finding the Lost Expedition
Description:
I saw a fire near some wreckage up ahead. We should investigate it to see if there are more survivors.

You're the greenest of the recruits, so you're coming with me. The others will search the island for clues.

Let's move.
ObjectivesText: Search the nearby camp for expedition survivors.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Alaria within the Abandoned Camp.

Objectives.Text: Travel north to find any expedition survivors
